name: 陳柏瑄
objective:
本課程旨在介紹有效研發 / 創新管理的概念、原則、與標準，這些概念、原則與標準將成為知識密集型的組織與企業的關鍵競爭優勢。本課程將介紹一些相關企業個案和練習活動，用以連結國家、產業和企業的研發或創新活動，並選定方法和工具進行有效的整合功能、企業業務、研發和創新活動。
This course is intended to introduce the concepts, principles, and standards for effective R&D/innovation management that is becoming the critical competitive advantages for the knowledge-intensive organizations and firms. The course will introduce a number of related cases and exercises with a view to bridge the national, industrial and corporate R&D/innovation activities, along with the presentation of selected approaches, methods and tools to effectively integrate functional, business and corporate R&D and innovation activities as a whole.
schedule:
Week 1: Course introduction & grouping
Week 2: (1)The trends and scope of R&D management
Week 3: (2)The generation of R&D management & open innovation
Week 4: (3)R&D planning and road mapping
Week 5: (4)Industrial dynamics of R&D
Week 6: (5)R&D Strategy, outsourcing and     alliance
Week 7: (6)Invited talk-High tech and R&D oriented
Week 8: (7)Globalization of R&D
Week 9: (8)Design R&D organization and team work
Week 10: (9)Field trip-Giant Company
Week 11: (10)New product/service development
Week 12: (11)Managing R&D professionals
Week 13: (12)R&D project selection and portfolio
Week 14: (13)R&D performance and evaluation
Week 15: (14)Business model innovation
Week 16:(15) Case discussion
Week 17:(15) Case discussion
Week 18:Final Project
